verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
CALABAR: Abasi mi Edi Utibe
Abasi mi Edi
Abasi mi Edi Utibe
Abasi mi Edi

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
UROHBO:
Egbuno ro Oghene Aware
Egbuno ro Oghene Orwaro
Egbuno ro Oghene Aware
Egbuno ro Oghene Orwaro

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
IGBO:
Ebube ka chi anyi di
Ebube ka o di…..
Ebube ka chineke anyi di…..

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
YORUBA: Iyanu Lolo run
Iyanu nii
Iyanu Lolorun awaa

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
ENGLISH: Wonderful is the Lord
Wonderful He is
Wonderful is our Lord God

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Call: Onise Iyanu
Resp: Wonderful
Call: Ola ju afo ju
Resp: Wonderful
Call: O Ju oku didee
Resp: Wonderful
Call: O maa ro larada
Resp: Wonderful

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Call: I say Wonderful Daddy
Resp: Wonderful
call: In all Situation
Resp: Wonderful
Call: In our lives oo
Resp: wonderful

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
Call: I Say Wonderful Daddy
Resp: Wonderful
Call: Wonderful Jesus
Resp: Wonderful
Call: In EPIC Mission
Resp: Wonderful
Call: I n the Life of Daddy Bishop
Resp: Wonderful

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
Call: All the Pastors
Resp: Wonderful
Call: All the Evangelists
Resp: Wonderful
Call: Deacon & Deaconess
Resp: Wonderful
Call: In the Choirs
Resp: Wonderful

verse.name: v1j
verse.lines:
Call: In the life of our children
Resp: Wonderful
Call: In Nigeria
Resp: Wonderful
Call: I say Wonderful God oo
